item.title: CVE-2024-2424|2024-04-15T21:26:20.115Z -- Rockwell Automation -- 5015-AENFTXT
item.description: An input validation vulnerability exists in the Rockwell AutomationÂ 5015-AENFTXT that causes the secondary adapter to result in a major nonrecoverable fault (MNRF) when malicious input is entered. If exploited, the availability of the device will be impacted, and a manual restart is required. Additionally, a malformed PTP packet is needed to exploit this vulnerability.
